ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: active threads
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Rob, For how long have you been crawling these seeds? Is it possible that the crawl is almost done and only one host is left to be crawled. In

Hi Rob,

For how long have you been crawling these seeds? Is it possible that the crawl is almost done and 
only one host is left to be crawled. In progress-statistics.log do you see that number of busy 
threads was around 20 for some time at the beginning?

Could you also send us the order file for us to take a look at it.
Thank you.

Take care,
i.

> --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "robeger" <reger@a...> wrote:
> 
>>I've got a crawl running with 21 seed URIs, and the max toe threads is
>>set to 50.  I've never seen a higher number than "4 of 50" in the
>>active threads value on the console page.  Am I not understanding
>>something, or do I maybe have something set incorrectly?  I guess I
>>was expecting that  I'd see more active threads (21? since there were
>>21 hosts being crawled?)
>>
>>Thanks,
>>Rob.
